en: You've stumbled across an app suite that seems pretty nifty. Organized checklists and calendar events dance in front of your eyes. Buy it and give it a shot?
It makes you a bit more productive for a week, but you can't figure out the fiddly mechanics to get it to do exactly what you wanted. At least it helped!
You've been down this path before. Productivity apps tend to distract more than help. You pass.
